mapper.select: select t.* from menu_type mt, type t where mt.type_id = t.type_id and mt.menu_id = #{menu_id}
select a.* from menu_allergen ma, allergen a where ma.all_id = a.all_id and ma.menu_id = #{menu_id}

select m.* from menu m
,category c where m.category_id = c.category_id and m.category_id = #{category_id}
where 1=1
and m.menu_del = 'N' order by menu_date desc

select m.* from menu m join menu_type mt on m.menu_id = mt.menu_id join type t on t.type_id = mt.type_id where m.menu_del = 'N' and m.category_id = #{category_id}
and mt.type_id in (${typeIdStr})
